label:
This is an desktop notification that is sent to the user of when someone mentions him in the comments of post.
You can insert the following dynamic values:

##TaggedBy## - Name of the user that tagged another user
##FullName## - Name of the user tagged
##NotificationType## - Notification type
##ActivityTitle## - Cropped comment text

template.message: ##TaggedBy## has mentioned you in a comment ##ActivityTitle##
template.title: ##NotificationType##
